description: Furnishing of all plant, labor, equipment and material required for wharf and launchway reconstruction
duration_in_months: She will deliver the wharf and launchway reconstruction contract within 40 months after contract award \\{months guarantee not provided\\}
full_summary:
### RECONSTRUCTION DU QUAI ET DE LA RAMPE DE LANCEMENT DU MINISTÈRE DES PÊCHESES ET DES OÉCANS (MPO) – ILE AUX MORTS (T.-N.-L.)

#### DLC NUMBER AND PUBLICATION DATE

* DLC id: WS4149847000
* Publication Date: August 17, 2023

#### REQUEST FOR TENDER

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) invites bidders to submit an offer for Wharf and Launchway Reconstruction at Isle Aux Morts, Newfoundland and Labrador.

#### CONSTRUCTION WORK

The contract entails furnishing all necessary plant, labour, equipment and materials for the execution of the Wharf and Launchway Reconstruction project. Estimated value for this opportunity lies in the range of $1,000,001 to $5,000,000.

#### DELIVERY TIMEFRAME AND DELIVERY LOCATION

Deliverables must be completed within 54 weeks from the date of contract award. Work shall be executed at the location: Isle Aux Morts, Newfoundland and Labrador

#### COMPETITIVE TENDERING

Bid submission shall occur in two phases: Open Bid Call (Phase 1) and Selective Tendering (Phase 2). Bid security will be required for this tender during Phase 2.

#### CONTACT INFORMATION AND TENDER DETAILS

* Contractor Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Information: Alexandria Dwyer, (alexmia.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### RELATED INFORMATION

The notice and tender documentation are available for reference on the Ariba website: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17192575?extsite=MTcxOTI1NzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.
